title: Ep. 146 "He Snatched My Soul"
description:
No guests this week, just a Kiki and Medinah playing a game of truth or drink, plus we're discussing some of the topics you guys requested
Remember to get your tickets to the live shows at  www.cocktalespod.eventbrite.com
HOUSTON 9/14- Lex P & Drea of Pour Minds Podcast will be joining us in Houston
DALLAS 9/21
Text COCKTALES to 303030 for a free month of OpenFit
Send advice emails to askcocktales@gmail.com
Check us out on IG @kikisaidso @coffeebeandean @cocktalespodcast
